title: Onboarding Remote Tech Employees to Microsoft Teams
description: A practical, easy-to-follow course for onboarding remote tech employees to Microsoft Teams. The goal is to help them feel comfortable and confident using Teams for daily communication, collaboration, and productivity without overwhelming them with too much information at once.
goal: Help remote tech employees become proficient in Microsoft Teams for daily tasks such as communication, collaboration, and productivity without feeling overwhelmed.
audience: Tech professionals joining a company that uses Microsoft Teams for the first time.

sections.title: Overview of Microsoft Teams
sections.description: An introduction to what Microsoft Teams is and its key features.

sections.title: Setting Up Your Profile
sections.description: How to set up your personal profile in Microsoft Teams.

sections.title: Chat Basics
sections.description: Understanding how to use chat for daily communication.

sections.title: Making Calls and Meetings
sections.description: Mastering the tools for making calls and scheduling meetings.

sections.title: Using Channels
sections.description: How to effectively utilize channels for team collaboration.

sections.title: Sharing Files and Notes
sections.description: Steps to share files, notes, and other resources within Teams.

sections.title: Leveraging Apps and Integrations
sections.description: How to use apps and integrations for enhanced productivity.

sections.title: Using Planner and Calendar
sections.description: Steps to utilize planner and calendar features for better organization.
